commands:
add: add new alarm in this format => 22:35 
Notice: after write add go to new line
Example:
add
22:30
Example multi:
add
22:30,23:30,05:46

remove: remove an alarm in this format => 22:35 
Notice: after write remove go to new line
Example:
remove
22:30
Example multi:
remove
22:30,23:30,05:46

channel: to set channel that bot send message there 
Notice: after write channel go to new line, don't forget make the robot admin in the channel, without @
Example:
channel
your_channel_name

repeat: to set how many repeat an alarm 
Notice:after write repeat go to new line, if you set 3, in 3 minutes, every minute one time you get message,
Example:
repeat
5

list: to get all the alarms
Example:
list
